item.title: How to Write an Actionable Alert
item.description: Intro “If a tree falls in a forest and no one is around to hear it, does it make a sound?” This mantra about possibly non-existent trees very much applies to detection engineers. If you write a great rule, but no one (or nothing) acts upon the alert, did you even generate make a noise? In this article, I will strive to express upon to you the importance of not only writing solid detections, but also solid alerts.
